nodes.text: Invasion 0, Part 2 is the second of the two StarWars.com special mini-issues of Star Wars: Invasion, which serve as a lead-up to the first story arc of the series. It was collected in Star Wars: Invasion 0.
Written by Tom Taylor, with at by Colin Wilson, and colors by Wes Dzioba, the story begins shortly after the events in the New Jedi Order novel The New Jedi Order: Vector Prime . . .
